entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
